content: 𝗠𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗯𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗲𝘀 𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗔𝗜 – 𝗯𝘂𝘁 𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲𝘆 𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗶𝘁 𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗽𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗯𝗹𝘆? 🤖📈 According to new data from CBS (Statistics Netherlands), AI adoption among Dutch companies is growing rapidly:👉 𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗱 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗰𝗹𝗲 (𝗶𝗻 𝗗𝘂𝘁𝗰𝗵) --> https://lnkd.in/eAquUfqc From smart customer interactions to predictive analytics, AI is becoming part of everyday business. But as AI use increases, so do the risks — especially with the AI Act being enforced.✅ Do your teams understand how your AI systems make decisions?✅ Can you be sure your tools are fair and non-discriminatory?✅ Are you ready for what the AI Act requires? That’s where SimplyComplai comes in.We help organisations:▪ Determine whether their AI tool falls under unacceptable (forbidden), high, or low risk.▪ Understand which legal obligations apply to their use of AI.▪ Take the right next steps with expert advice to ensure full compliance with the AI Act.🚀 Countdown has begun: SimplyComplai launches this 𝗠𝗮𝘆 - and ready to help you get AI right from day one.(𝘍𝘶𝘯 𝘧𝘢𝘤𝘵: 𝘈𝘐 𝘩𝘦𝘭𝘱𝘦𝘥 𝘶𝘴 𝘤𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘵𝘩𝘪𝘴 𝘱𝘰𝘴𝘵 😉) hashtag#AIAct hashtag#AICompliance hashtag#ResponsibleAI hashtag#AIEthics hashtag#SimplyComplai hashtag#ArtificialIntelligence hashtag#BusinessWithAI hashtag#CBS
